query: SELECT id, client_id, scan_date, body_fat_pct, lean_mass_kg, fat_mass_kg, total_mass_kg, vat_area_cm2 FROM dexa_scans WHERE client_id = 630001 AND status = 'approved' ORDER BY scan_date DESC LIMIT 1;
